title: Amelie Ou le Temps D'aimer = Amelia or Time for Love
abstract: Note: Adapted from 'Amelie Boule' by Michele Angot.
description: At the end of the 19th century, an orphan girl living near the Mont Saint-Michel island is secretly in love with her cousin Alain. Alain has two passions: the sea and Amelie's Parisian cousin, Fanny. Realising that her secret love may never be repaid, Amelie slowly loses the will to live.  Credits: Producer, Mina Berard ; director, Michel Drach ; writer, Michel Drach ; photography, Jean Tournier ; music, Jean-Sebastien Bach. Cast: Marie-Jose Nat, Jean Sorel, Clotilde Joano, Roger Van Mullem, Jean Babilee, Sophie Daumier, Louise de Vilmorin.
